text:
e="preserve">Arturo Tizón Ibáñez (25 May 1984 – 16 January 2021) was a Spanish motorcycle racer. He was born in La Vall d'Uixó, Spain. From 2005 to 2007, he competed in the 250cc Motorcycle World championship. He was the CEV Supersport champion in 2005.
Tizón was killed on 16 January 2021 in a biking accident in Alcudia de Veo, Spain at the age of 36.
